original_text: and they set up false witnesses who said, “This man never ceases to speak words against this holy place and the law,
korean_text: 거짓 증인들을 세우니 이르되 이 사람이 이 거룩한 곳과 율법을 거슬러 말하기를 마지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: and they set up false witnesses
“This man never ceases to speak words
against this holy place and the law,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 거룩한 곳과 율법을 거슬러 말한다
